name: com.mobile.vitarka
description: A sample Apache Cordova application that responds to the deviceready event.

scripts.push: cordova build android && adb -s 192.168.0.100:5555 shell am force-stop com.example.hello && adb -s 192.168.0.100:5555 shell input keyevent KEYCODE_WAKEUP && adb -s 192.168.0.100:5555 install -r $PWD/platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk && osascript -e 'display notification "App Reinstalled" with title "Cordova" sound name "Submarine"' && adb -s 192.168.0.100:5555 shell monkey -p com.mobile.vitarka -c android.intent.category.LAUNCHER 1

author: Apache Cordova Team
